title: Chapter 208: When Did I Change?
body:
Chapter 208: When Did I Change?

Su Yan stumbled down the stairs into his car, and drove aimlessly through the bustling streets.


His thoughts were:


On the day that Ning Xi, clutching her wounds called for his help. But he was rude and tried to push his own beliefs of what happened on her…


Filled with the day in the hospital, when she faced Ning uncle and Ning Aunt’s accusations, her clear eyes full of sadness, stubbornly refusing to bow down to their words……


Filled with the day when he said those wounding words and accusations……


After that incident, he immediately stood at Ning Xuelo’s side, never thinking to listen to her explanation.


Even when they broke up and he wanted to marry her sister, instead of protecting her he has always been doing things to hurt her.


Ning Xuelo has him, her parents’ love, a supportive agency, and fans…


But she has been wronged all over the world, burdened with abuse, and endured the grievances and accusations of others.


In the end, the person who is actually concerned about her, and not just claiming to be in a stance of hypocritical justice is a complete stranger.


Through a glass window, he watched an LED screen outside the shopping center.


Ning Xi had a serious expression. Word by word, she answered the reporter’s question: “I want to work hard and help the boss make more money, in return for helping with my career. To prove that he did not make the wrong choice.”


He knew that this is not a formal answer, but one from her heart. She has such a temper, but as long as people do good to her, she will do her best to repay them.


His heart was pounding so much, he could hardly breathe…he always thought that she had changed, when in fact, the person who changed was him.


His mind kept on wandering back to the memories of that day through the ward window, watching her all alone in the courtyard…


Thinking of that thin, hopeless back……his heart felt as if stabbed by a knife…


………


At night in VIVI bar. This is a very small bar, in a remote location but it’s quite stylish. Its well known in the entertainment business, and since their privacy is very good, many people come to relax at this place.


Ning Xi has been sitting in a booth when Jiang Muye arrives. She was sitting cross legged on the sofa, and the coffee table has several empty bottles.


Ning Xi took off his mask and sunglasses.


“Hey Hey, you didn’t wait for me and started drinking on your own?” Jiang Muye cried out. “Didn’t you stop drinking? I also do not want you to drink!”


Ning Xi shrugged, “Well, when I did, you started drinking. Have you gotten me some juice?”


“You ass! Go get your own juice from the bar!” Jiang Muye snapped and glared at her.


So Ning Xi rang the bell to call the waiter. A handsome little brother came in and asked with a smile: “Miss, what would you like?”


Ning Xi took out a big bill and stuffed it into his pocket, “Little brother, help big sister to buy two bottles of juice yeah?”


The waiter froze for a moment, his cheeks red, then he laughed: “I am at your service.”


On the side, Jiang Muye is staring so much his eyeballs almost pop out.


“Ning Xi! You need to stop! Don’t you see how he’s looking at you because you teased him?


Ning Xi casually stretched her legs out and kicked him: “Mind your own business. I just teased him. It is nothing. Your dirty mind only sees what is dirty.


J


iang Muye pats his pants, some dirt coming off. “Don’t you talk to me about something others did. That’s not the point!”


“Wasn’t it you that started it first?” Ning replied, then leaned back on the sofa and sighed. After a long day, it is no longer possible to cover up her fatigue and it showed on her face.
